Title: Nigeria announces reforms to boost investment into oil and gas sector
Description: The Nigerian President, Bola Tinubu, signed executive orders introducing tax credits for some onshore and shallow water locations and streamlining contract approvals, improving the investment climate in the countryâ€™s oil and gas industry and filling in the gaps in the landmark petroleum law.
Author: JS

Title: Delfin Midstream requests DOE extension to complete FLNG project by 2029
Description: US-based LNG project developer Delfin Midstream is seeking an additional five years to complete its 13 mtpa Delfin floating LNG project offshore Louisiana, just 90 days before the expiration of the existing permits.
Author: JS
